channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Thriving Smart Cities Unfold Where Connectivity Meets Community
item.description: The most successful smart cities actively collaborate with private sector partners to co-invest in, build and sometimes co-own infrastructure.
